alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 3:23PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson and southeastern Leon Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 323 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Florida A and M, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida A and M, Ralford Greenway, Cody, Miccosukee Road Greenway, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Killearn Estates, Chaires, Lake Ella, Waukeenah, Wacissa, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall, Midtown, Lake Miccosukee, Springsax Park and Apalachee Regional Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
